item.title: Projects
item.description: In this section I will be tracking my active projects. More needs to be written here, but for the time being: The GamePicker In GamePicker, you can supply the link to your Steam profile and it will fetch your list of owned games, then pick a game from the list for you to play. Picking a game to play, really anything, is a surprisingly common problem amongst my friends. They requested that I make a tool to help them out.
